definition[0]: a group of sports teams or players who play games against each other to see who is best
note[0]: be (at the) top/bottom of the league (=be the best or the worst team in a group)
example[0]: He makes his football league debut tomorrow.
definition[1]: a group of people or countries who have joined together because they have similar aims, political beliefs etc
definition[2]: an ancient unit for measuring distance, equal to three miles or about 4,828 metres on land, and three nautical miles or 5,556 metres at sea
